(.+?)<|col3.+?class="bqDestacadoV">.+?title="(.+?)".+?img src="(.+?)" https://www.diainternacionalde.com/ https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg --------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B][COLOR white] El tiempo en las principales ciudades[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist] makelist [B][COLOR lime][makelist.param1][/COLOR] - [COLOR white][makelist.param2][/COLOR] [COLOR red][makelist.param3] [makelist.param4][/COLOR] [COLOR skyblue][makelist.param5] [makelist.param6][/COLOR] [COLOR white][makelist.param7][/COLOR][/B] na https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg (?s)class="text-sec">(.+?)<.+?data="(.+?)\|.+?data="(.+?)\|.+?alt="(.+?)" https://www.tiempo.com/ https://i.imgur.com/xVOth0G.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg ..................................................................... (.+?) https://www.partidos-de-hoy.com/futbol-resultados-hoy/ https://i.imgur.com/wIxqlE4.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ [B][COLOR white]Clasificación LaLiga EA Sports 2023/2024[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist] makelist [B][makelist.param1] [COLOR orange][makelist.param3][/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param4][/COLOR] [COLOR lime][makelist.param5][/COLOR][/B] na https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg class="pos">(.+?)<.+?src="(.+?)" alt="(.+?)".+\W.+\W.+\W.+\W.+?"(total puntos)_total">(.+?)< https://resultados.elpais.com/deportivos/futbol/primera/clasificacion/ https://i.imgur.com/49dfKw5.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B][COLOR white] Clasificaciones del Mundial de Fórmula 1 2024[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist] makelist [B][COLOR lime][makelist.param1][/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param2][/COLOR][COLOR blue][makelist.param3][/COLOR] [COLOR pink][makelist.param4][/COLOR] [COLOR orange][makelist.param5][/COLOR][/B] na https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg

    (\d\d-\d\d-\d\d\d\d)|(.+?)[B][COLOR orange][makelist.param1][/COLOR] [COLOR yellow][makelist.param4][/COLOR] [COLOR lime][makelist.param3][/COLOR][/B] na https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg class="txt-al-r">.+?(\w.+?.+)\W.+?itemprop="image" src="(.+?)".+\W.+?resultado resul_post">(.+?)<.+\W.+?itemprop="name">.+?(\w.+?.+) https://resultados.elpais.com/deportivos/baloncesto/acb/jornada/ https://i.imgur.com/kfs1QcO.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B] Loterias y Apuestas del Estado [/B] na https://raw.githubusercontent.com/danvalbel/addonfreeplaylist/main/loterias%20y%20apuestas%20del%20estado.xml https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- [B][COLOR white] Programacion TDT[/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist] makelist [B][COLOR white][makelist.param2][/B][/COLOR] $doregex[makelist1] https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpegg (?s)(.+?)< https://www.programacion-tdt.com/ makelist1 [B][COLOR white][makelist1.param1] - [makelist1.param2][/B][/COLOR] na https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg (?s)(.+?)\W.+?class="ind">.+?;(.+?)< [makelist.param1] https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg https://i.imgur.com/b7hSWTR.jpeg
